DOC.brief_summary: This safety extension study DR-OXY-301 pre-selected site . Subjects complete DR-OXY-301 study eligible participate . The duration extension study approximately 42 week . Subjects physical laboratory exam , include blood draw schedule visit colposcopic examination vagina cervix . As DR-OXY-301 , subject require insert vaginal ring ; replace every 4 week . Subjects also require keep daily record number time total amount time ring outside body day reason voluntary removal .
DOC.criteria: Completed 12 week treatment DROXY301 study Willing limit medication overactive bladder investigational product Able understand complete study procedure include require diary
